entry.title: 我的第一篇文章
entry.content:
Fibonacci数列定义： Fibonacci数列的递推公式为：F(n)=F(n-1)+F(n-2)，其中F1=F2=1。 代码实现～C:求第n个数–>时间复杂度O(n)算法123456789101112131415161718192021#include<stdio.h> int main() { int a1,a2; a1=a2=1; int temp; //temp作为数据交换的中介 long n; //因为n>=1 and n<=1000000 long i; scanf("%ld",&n); for(i=1;i<n;i++) { //a1 作为f(n);a2为f(n+1) //a1+a2=f(n+2) temp=a2; a2=a1+a2; a1=temp; } printf("%d
",a1); return 0; } ::此种方法是将temp一个指针，指示当前位置，不断向后移，需注意循环次数！:: 求第n个数 - 时间复杂度O(nlogn)算法(递归)1234567891011121314151617#include<stdio.h> int Fibo(int n) { if(n==1||n==2) return 1; else return Fibo(n-1)+Fibo(n-2); } int main() { int n=0; scanf("%d",&n); printf("%d
",Fibo(n)); return 0; } ::重点掌握！！:: 求Fn除以10007的余数1234567891011121314#include<stdio.h>int F[1000002];int main(){ int n,i; scanf("%d",&n); F[1]=1;F[2]=1; for(i=3;i<=n;i++) { F[i]=(F[i-1]+F[i-2])%10007; } printf("%d
",F[n]); return 0;}//此题为蓝桥杯测试题 ::通过这道题，发现一个有规律的数列，它关于某个数的余数也可能存在相同的规律，做题时要注意！:: #编程知识/CPP

entry.title: Hello World
entry.content: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick StartCreate a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment
